channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside DOGE’s Plan to Invade the Treasury—and Throttle USAID
item.description: Court filings show that from the earliest days of the second Trump administration, Elon Musk’s DOGE had a plan to infiltrate US Treasury payment syste...

item.title: Leaked data exposes a Chinese AI censorship machine
item.description: One academic who reviewed the dataset said it was "clear evidence" that China, or its affiliates, wants to use AI to improve repression.

item.title: 19 founders and VCs working with Elon Musk’s DOGE
item.description: Silicon Valley used to take a backseat to Washington, D.C. But now, the people disrupting technology have taken the wheel at the highest echelons of g...

item.title: How Extropic Plans to Unseat Nvidia
item.description: Challenging the world's most successful chipmaker with an entirely new type of computer chip may seem absurd—but it is no more ridiculous than the AI ...

item.title: SpaceX reportedly has a secret backdoor for Chinese investment
item.description: Elon Musk’s rocket company SpaceX has allowed Chinese investors to buy stakes as long as the funds are routed through the Cayman Islands or other offs...

item.title: Bradley Tusk says he makes more money with ‘equity-for-services’ than he did as a traditional VC
item.description: Bradley Tusk, co-founder and managing partner at Tusk Venture Partners, told TechCrunch in today’s episode of Equity that VC as we know it is dead. An...

item.title: Avocado Mattress Review: A Comfortable, Eco-Friendly, Organic Mattress
item.description: The Avocado Green Mattress manages to be soft and plush while still offering a supportive base good for combination sleepers.

item.title: 21 Great Gifts for Mom: Ideas for the Best Mother (2025)
item.description: There are many kinds of mothers, but these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

item.title: OpenAI adopts rival Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI models to data
item.description: OpenAI is embracing rival Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI assistants to the systems where data resides. In a post on X on Wednesday, OpenAI CEO...

item.title: A New Social Media App Punishes Users for Rage-Baiting
item.description: On Sez Us, users who are intentionally inflammatory may score lower than those who gain influence through respectful dialog.
